titleStmt.title: Christus redivivus: or The first fruits of them that sleepe Deliuered in a sermon at the Temple Church in Easter tearme last, 1623.
titleStmt.author: Ailesbury, Thomas, fl. 1622-1659.
T. S., fl. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: By G. E[ld] for Leonard Becket, and are to be sold at his shop neere the Temple Church,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 21519b on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop neere the Temple Church
